greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct squarefree parts.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) ~ exp(sqrt(2*n)) / (2^(1/4) * sqrt(Pi) * n^(3/4)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 24 2018
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[i*(i+1)/2 < n, 0, If[n == 0, 1, b[n, i-1] + If[i <= n && SquareFreeQ[i], b[n-i, i-1], 0]]]; a[n_] := b[n, n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 24 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
nmax = 100; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[Sum[(-1)^(j + 1)/j * Sum[Abs[MoebiusMu[k]] * x^(j*k), {k, 1, Floor[nmax/j] + 1}], {j, 1, nmax}]], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 31 2018 *)
program: p (k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks (m - k) + p ks m
a(n)=my(s,u); forpart(v=n, if(ok(v), s++)); s \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 05 2017
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 24 2003
ext: Offset changed and a(0)=1 prepended by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2015
